EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_OpenHub Meetups_Q214.MeetUp Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Hey Bay Area! Join us for one of our upcoming Meetups!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Register now for these upcoming Meetups on Hadoop, R, Parquet, and Cloud Foundry - great open technologies for Big Data, PaaS, and Data Science solutions!
Brought to you by Pivotal Open Source Hub:
- May 14 (Wed) in SF: PL/R and PivotalR in MPP databases, future of PivotalR w/ Hai Qian (Pivotal) REG NOW <http://bit.ly/POSH0035>!
- May 15 (Thu) in SF: Parquet: Open-source columnar format for Hadoop w/ Dmitriy Ryaboy (Twitter) & Milind Bhandarkar (Pivotal) REG NOW <http://bit.ly/POSH0036>!
- May 19 (Mon) in SF: Cloud Foundry: Open Cloud Deployments FTW with David Stevenson (Pivotal) REG NOW <http://bit.ly/POSH0037>!
- May 20 (Tue) in SF: Hadoop Cluster Configuration and Performance Tuning with Suhas Gogate (Pivotal) REG NOW <http://bit.ly/POSH0038>!
We hope you can join us!
**The Pivotal San Francisco Meetups are located at 875 Howard St, San Francisco, CA between 4th and 5th Streets. Check-in at the Lobby is required and you will be badged up the secure elevator by one of our staff to the correct floor. Online RSVP is required prior to the event.
